ELECTIONS MAY 4, 2024
---------------------

The City of Elsa contracted Hidalgo County Elections Department to conduct the 2024 Elections.

<https://www.hidalgocounty.us/3272/May-4-2024-Local-Entities-Elections>

[Qualifications](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1w0nSGy8bIIKBjS5cFe40gEfrjL6Es-iQ/view?usp=sharing)
[Ordinance](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nAK7F_MsvK4fDAkAawMHFv7Ob_Aw67PP/view?usp=sharing)

A CANDIDATE’S PACKAGE WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR PICKUP AT CITY SECRETARY’S OFFICE.

[UNIFORM ELECTION DATES](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/voter/important-election-dates.shtml#2024)
[PROCEDURES](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/candidates/index.shtml)
[HB 2626](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/data/legislation/HB2626_88RS-ALL_CFRs_Online.pdf)

If you are creating your report pdf using the TEC local filing application, you may attach a completed Form UD as the last page of your report in lieu of getting your report notarized before submitting you report to your local filing authority.

[TEXAS ETHICS COMMISSION](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/forms/local/localcohfrm.php)
